Mr Justice Holman said Michael Gove 's actions over the scrapping of the Building Schools for the Future( BSF) initiative last year had been so unfair as to amount to an abuse of power. Under the Â£ 55bn scheme introduced by Labour, every secondary school in England was to be either rebuilt or refurbished. More than 700 schools' building projects were cancelled when the scheme was scrapped in July
